text: Gei nia daane dogolima ga hagatanga gaa hula gi di waahale o Laish. Digaula gaa mmada gi di noho di aumaalia o nia daangada e hai gadoo be digau Sidon. Digaula la digau e tenetene, e noho deemuu, hagalee lagalagamaaloo, nadau mee huogodoo ala e hiihai ginai gu i golo. Digaula e noho mogowaa i digau Sidon, ge hagalee buni anga gi nnuai daangada.
